Posts.Content: Feb 15, 2013 08:02AM LisaEllen wrote: I'd ask for confirmation either way. Not calling is appropiate after a routine screening, not a biopsy!! My heart and prayers go out to you, waiting is difficult.Â  As for the bruising, I wouldn't worry-sometimes it takes a few days. It also could be you didn't bruise for some reason. Bruising or not bruising is not clinically significant and doesn't matter. As for itching, mine itched like crazy as it healed. Ice made it feel better. Best of luck.
Posts.Title: Patiently waiting Mcol86 CherieBear
